name: Brain 8
description:
My most technically advanced game, with a big effort to make it fast in plain BASIC, and with special visual and sound effects (at least I think they are...).

I am specially proud about the final dance, in which I used BEEP to play the melody while Brain 8 dances.

All tiles from the 9 areas are not sprites, but regular ASCII characters merged using OVER. So, no UDG were defined.
